name: Good Neighbor Next Door Sales Program
objective:
The purpose of the Good Neighbor Next Door Sales Program is to improve the quality of life in distressed urban communities. This is to be accomplished by encouraging law enforcement officers, teachers, firefighters, and emergency medical technicians, 
to purchase and live in homes that are located in the same communities where they perform their daily responsibilities and duties.
top_agency_name: Department of Housing and Urban Development
sub_agency_name: Assistant Secretary for Housing -- Federal Housing Commissioner
assistance_types: Sale, Exchange, or Donation of Property or Goods
beneficiary_types: Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)
applicant_types: Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)
rules_regulations: HUD Regulations at 24 CFR Part 291.  Program information is available on HUD's website at https://www.hud.gov/program_offices/housing/sfh/reo/goodn/gnndabot
